website_summaries.verdict: Engineered for full extension that can target all abdominal muscles.
pros: Known to create more backside curvature than other products, creating contraction within deeper muscle groups
The mat's firmness also allows for a great lower back stretch
We love the real six-pack potential
cons: The mat's height may not be the best fit for all customers

customer_reviews.title: GET IT! This is the Ab Mat you want!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ab mat and I would highly recommend to anyone. I attend a CF gym 5 days a week and we often use ab mats. This is by far superior to the ones our gyms offers. I bring mine in everyday. The angles are great. Much more effective than simply doing sit-ups on a flat surface. I was surprised by how sore I was after the first use. This ab mat is firm with light cushioning which has held up great. Seems to be made of durable materials. Very Well-made. I have not had any issues with it as of yet. I LOVE IT! GET IT!
customer_reviews.author: Southern_Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but definietly needs a good break in
customer_reviews.text: I am a Crossfit athlete and I wanted to have a few smaller items at home to get in a quick workout at random hours or on snow days, so I bought this ab mat. It's definitely hard as some of the other review have suggested, seriously like a rock, but that does help you keep the rounded back to prevent any pain. It just needs to be broken in for me personally who is used to the used up ab mats at the gym that have a couple thousand sit ups on them.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly sure what they had in mind here
customer_reviews.text: This cushion is decently constructed, I’ll grant them that. It is also however rather thick, too thick really to be a sit up support cushion, though shaped as though that’s what it’s meant to be that. So I’m not really sure what to do use it for. The instructions come with some silly suggestion to use this for head protection in a headstand (yoga style I guess), but that’s not really why someone would buy this. Just doesn’t match your lumbar for support in a crunch or sit up, so it’s on the shelf in my gym without getting much use.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Great product- helps w back relief while working out
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My son works out with me and hates doing abs cause he tail bone and back will hurt. Got this and now I use it too. :) only thing that I would improve - add one extra pad for length. I’m a tall girl. Helps when starting out in a full body lay down for comfort. But really most of them are crunched up anyways - so def not a deal breaker! Also arrived in great timing and great condition. Will probably order another one for myself :)
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: solid and well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid, well made product. I use them frequently for CrossFit workouts and they have held up better than the Ab-Mats used at my gym...given that they don't get used as frequently as the ones at my gym. Still, I expect they'll last a very long time with home use. If I ever need more, I'd choose this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction with good firmness
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy and well constructed pad, very firm but not hard or uncomfortable. We use it to lift the hips during acro-yoga to supplement lower back and hip flexibility (men are often less flexible in the hips than women, and this makes L-poses safe and comfortable) and it solves this problem beautifully while providing a stable surface for flying a partner. We purchased this brand after being introduced by a friend whose well-used pad has stood up well to a year’s hard use.
customer_reviews.author: C. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Sit up and take notice:  sometimes you get things backwards!
customer_reviews.text: Was about to send this back(too hard and uncomfortable) and then read reviews for other mats selling on Amazon. Many reviewers noted that in the photos the mats are all being used backwards! So I figured, what the heck, I flipped it around and--it now works fine for me :) Backwards seems to have made all the difference. Whether this works for you or not, Synergee gets credit for a high quality item!
customer_reviews.author: S. Mescher

customer_reviews.title: Sit-ups without the tailbone pain.
customer_reviews.text: I've recently gotten serious about working out. Sit-ups are part of my regime and I have been using a foam pad to cushion my tailbone. The pad I was using was one of those pads you can buy at stadiums to make sitting on bleacher seats less uncomfortable. It's better than nothing but when I came across this product I could see how it was better suited for the job. The lumbar support is a bonus. I'm extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive better quality who would have guessed
customer_reviews.text: I own a Rage, Rogue and now two synergee mats. I feel these are to each their own type of equipment however I love the synergee for two reason. One: it's stiffer than the others I tried and that feels good on my lower back forcing the lower back to stretch. Two: it sits just a bit higher than the other two and I feel when it gets wore in it will still have a decent bend. The ones at our Xfit gym are not Synergee and are so flat now they are simply worthless. To he fair my wife likes these second best but it's my review not here :)
customer_reviews.author: Doug Button

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ab Mat
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time crossfit enthusiast and have used a lot of Ab Mats. This Ab Mat is great. It gives that full range of motion that a regular sit-up just can't. My family now all use this even my husband who thought I was silly to buy a mat to do sit-ups. I love this Ab Mat and would highly recommend it. I have had not problems with it, and feel is is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A Parent

customer_reviews.title: Highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this core mat it's great support and really improves my workout. The shape is perfect and the thickness is really good. I would highly recommend this core mat. Others I purchased in the past were not thick enough to make a difference and didn't support me properly while doing crunches ect... Added : its been months since i purchased and they sent me a message saying that if i left a review they'd send me another as a free gift and they never did. My review does still stand because it is a great product. July 2018
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Cantor

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for supporting and padding low back while performing sit-ups / crunches on floor. Also seems to create a good abdominal stretch and better engage abdominal muscles. Also seems to preclude the need to hook my feet on something heavy during sit-ups. Like the covering - seems well made and anti-slip bottom very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value! True to Color! Blue ab mat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ab mat in the color blue right after my first CrossFit workout at my gym, they used ab mats there. It’s a Great value, great quality, true to color and I also really love the fact that they added a sheet with photos of exercises that you can do with the core mat. I highly recommend this ab mat to anyone doing core exercises especially sit-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic abmat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this abmat. It is the 3rd abmat I’ve owned and by far the best. The problem with normal abmats is that they’re pretty hard on you butt/tailbone and usually result in a rash/abrasion in that area after use. This abmat prevents this entirely with the extra pad. It is well built and seems very robust. Great price, great product
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Great Ab Mat
customer_reviews.text: I was using an ab mat like this one when I was a member of CF. What I love about these mats is the fact I can do an incredible amount of sit-ups without any back pain. The product is well made at a great price. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star rating is because when I first began using the mat, it was a bit hard but once as I used the mat, it became softer.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Stiff as a board
customer_reviews.text: I'm used to the Rogue ab mat and bought this because it was priced better and I live that it had the extra flat part. But compared to Rogue it is really stiff...like hurts my back (and I don't have a bad back) stiff. If you're looking for an ab mat on the stiffer side then go for it, but if not I would recommend you try another brand. To my fault I didn't try this until a couple days after the return period, otherwise I would have returned it. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Abs on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ab mat so that I could do sit ups anywhere. I'm not home a lot during the weekends and this is perfect to fold up and take with me anywhere. I prefer using an ab mat to just a plain flat yoga mat, because sometimes the sit-up motion causes the spot right above my tailbone to rub raw and become sore so that I cannot do sit ups again for a couple of days. The arch is slightly higher than other ab mats that I've used before, but it gives you more range of motion (and hopefully better results). I've been using it for almost a month now and am extremely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Enhances my workout routine!
customer_reviews.text: Reduces lower back pain and improves my form while doing sit-ups and crunches. I don't need to "hook" my feet while using this, which means I'm ACTUALLY using just my core for the exercises. Also really easy to clean/store. I've also used this to support my knees while doing other exercises that require kneeling, and it works great for that too. All around good product!
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: challenge
customer_reviews.text: this is a quality product, and quite the challenge for me. I just started working out after losing 40 pounds..and I hate exercising! In hindsight I should have gotten a flat mat, but this one is pushing me and it's good. it is shorter than I thought but no biggie, its comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this low priced abmat.
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this mat so far. Firmer than the others that I have tried, including Rogue. This is a big help as I am a bigger guy. Also the outside covering seem a bit more sturdy. I feel confident that even for the lower price of this abmat it will last a while. Great addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: murphylee1983

customer_reviews.title: A must have for sit ups!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Not only does it prevent my back from hurting while doing sit ups, there’s a pad to cushion my butt from the floor. I’m able to fully extend my stomach without the awkward/painful lower back sensation. Really fast processing and shipment, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: nasosufan

customer_reviews.title: Abmat useful consider not getting tail pad though
customer_reviews.text: Quality good, good support, I made the mistake of getting the tail pad version. Lifts me up and the extension in the back is a little too much for me. My mistake no flaw and the design.
customer_reviews.author: JesusLives

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to cook your abs and get them shredded!
customer_reviews.text: Just have to say, this has been a PHENOMENAL addition to my home gym. I am a Equinox trained personal trainer who's seen many different types of devices. Really feel the abs burn with this bad boy! I use it with my Total Gym and on my Total Flex machines, get it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Tronboxer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mat to use for sit-ups and reverse sit-ups
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mat to use for sit-ups and reverse sit-ups. The foam is nice and dense, and doesn't really have much give, which is a huge plus. I'm not really a fan of pink, but it was the cheaper option at the time, & at least it's not a bad shade. The only thing I would like that this doesn't have is for it to be a little bit wider.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase just narrow
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was afraid it would be too firm, luckily, it’s not. I took off one star because it’s smaller than I thought. Maybe when I’m skinnier from using it it will fit better but I doubt it. I’m about 160 lbs 5,4 just for a reference.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ab Mat- Only one issue
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ab mar. Very well made and durable. The only problem I had was that when placed on tile or a smooth surface it slides away from you when you’re doing sit ups because it doesn’t have a grippy material on the back side so I have to place it on a rubbery yoga mat in order for it not to slide away from me. Other than that, I’m pretty pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenissa

customer_reviews.title: Helps Lower back.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I don't hurt my back now when I do sit ups. My lower back doesn't hit the floor so this mat is very helpful in relieving the stress on my lower back. Still getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Very Firm
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these to do Crossfit-style workouts in our garage. It's firm and does not move around on the ground (we were doing sit-ups on yoga mats, with these on top). They are so firm, I honestly wish they were a bit softer. However, I think they will soften up a bit after we use them more. I like the colored sides because I know which one is mine versus my husband's.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but big
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built pad. It’s very long and wide. The leather material feels well built and strong. The foam stuffing is firm but feels like it will break in (in a good way). I gave it 4 starts because I am a smaller person and the foam part of the pad that would normally fit in the small of your back did not fit in mine. If they had a smaller one I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ZDOT

customer_reviews.title: Higher quality reps
customer_reviews.text: I look forward to my ab workouts now because of the low back support and the greater range of motion. I feel like each rep is a high quality rep now so I spend less time working abs and get better results.
customer_reviews.author: SheHulk

customer_reviews.title: versatile.
customer_reviews.text: great mat and versatile. i use it for handstand pushups as well as setups, and my shorter clients park the thinner cushion under their seat for barbell hip thrusts. gives them just the right amount of height and cushioning to optimize the exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Elise A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: This Synergee sit up Mat is very durable, I have ordered and used other mats and they rip, lose shape and don’t last long. This Mat is made to uphold a lot of weight. I have used it 5 times a week and it still looks brand new. Nothing to complain about, it also came with instructions on many more excersise’s it can be used for. I will give it a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: manny

customer_reviews.title: Great Support and Cushion!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have had major issues with our tailbone’s and it has been so hard to work out or simply just do sit ups that don’t hurt us. We LOVE this sit up mat because it allows us to not hurt ourselves even more, it allows us to workout without pain and it provides great support and cushion!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Belle

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my husband and it was a good size for him. I have a herniated disc and this seemed to aggravate it. - but it could just be the other activities I had done. It is really well made. Doesn’t slip and slide like others.
customer_reviews.author: Mm

customer_reviews.title: I also like the cushioning and use this for other exercises such ...
customer_reviews.text: It has helped my core workout very much. The extra extension helps get the lower abs. I also like the cushioning and use this for other exercises such as glute bridges and leg lifts. The rounded pad functions as a head and side cushion very nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Worka exactly as I expected. I bought it for ...
customer_reviews.text: Worka exactly as I expected. I bought it for my girlfriend because she had had a back injury in a car accident. She hasn't been able to lie on her back without some pain until she used this. She has been using it consistently and it has improved her overall core strength and it takes much more to actually feel pain.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a overall good product. Seems to be made of quality materials. The only issue that keeps this from being a 5 star product is that it is a little on the firm side, I believe after some more use that will soften though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this because I like to work out at home but hardwood floors hurt ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I like to work out at home but hardwood floors hurt when you do that. When it comes to floor exercising (ab work, planking, etc.), this mat gave enough cushion and support for my tailbone. The curve also lets you really lean back and stretch your core for sit-ups. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Hard at first...but softened over time
customer_reviews.text: I guess I’m used to the abmats at the gym that have been broken in. This was extremely hard when I got it. I opened it up and it’s simply a piece of hard foam with leather-like material over it. After a week of use it softened a little bit and didn’t hurt as much.
customer_reviews.author: beryliant

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered it!
customer_reviews.text: I've been working on my abs more and more lately and this pad helps out. I use it to stretch my abs before and after crunches, as well as during sets. Super easy to clean and it doesn't slip around. Saves my lower back as well. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Alan: Projectwoodworks

customer_reviews.title: Core May review
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this product to look a little different. It’s wide and not the shape I was looking for to support/contour to the shape of my back
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking to buy one of these since taking a free Cross Fit class, and this has turned out to be an great buy. The quality is much better than expected considering the cost. I also really like the color and it's sturdy and feels as if it will last for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family! :)
customer_reviews.text: My brother-in-law introduced me to this ab mat and I had to buy my own. I love how it feels on my back and I don't strain my neck like when I do sit-ups on the floor. I loaned mine to my mother and she bought her own, too!
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: Too hard
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, but compared to the abmats that we use in my Crossfit classes, this one is too stiff. It feels hard behind my back when I do situps. I just don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Reggae Dancer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product. I bought it specifically to use with my ab wheel (the yoga mat isn't enough padding) and it works great. I also do sit ups with it everyday. It also comes with a little exercise chart that's a nice bonus. Great product, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOOOVVVEEEE IT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a bootcamp I'm attending, it was advised by the instructor. And it is a God send, its soft but supports my back during sit-ups and pull ups. It's my new favorite workout item, I'll never work out without it.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Nicol

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and just what I was looking for in an ab mat. Just as good if not better than the ones found in ant crossfit gym plus I love the added color options. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: It works!  Good value for cost.  I recommend highly.
customer_reviews.text: Love this ab mat. Ordered another brand previously and returned because it was rock hard and painful to use. This mat is still firm, but has just enough cushion to be usable. Loved all the back exercises included along with ab ones. Very effective and easy to take when I travel. Good purchase in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: NanaDana

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my back issues when working out!
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described. I have lower back issues and can not do sit ups on a flat floor or even a mat but this products gives me the support I need to still be able to work out the way I need too. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I used a mat similar to this at Crossfit and wanted one for at home (as I was rehabbing from a hip surgery and not attending class). This is working out great. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sudore

customer_reviews.title: Great product but little narrow
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very well made. The only complaint is that it is just a little narrow. I am 6’2” and 235lbs. I can still use it and would buy it again but it would be perfect if it was 3 inches wider.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Best Core Mat Ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I was introduce to this type of product at CrossFit so I wanted one for myself at home, I looked up Core Ab Mat and found this one, it is wonderful. I can do a full sit up with out any strain on my lower back, I can do full sit without any problems what so ever.. I told some of the ladies I run with and they are in the process of ordering it as well. Best Product Ever!!
customer_reviews.author: france19912007

customer_reviews.title: Prefect ab mat
customer_reviews.text: Great ab mat for the price. Durable and has not lost its form or cracked since we’ve been using it in our garage gym. Will replace my wife’s ab mat with another one of these soon.
customer_reviews.author: RQuinn4

customer_reviews.title: My hips are terribly sensitive but this tailbone buffer thing helps so much
customer_reviews.text: Just got this, and it really helps my back, and neck while doing exercises. My hips are terribly sensitive but this tailbone buffer thing helps so much, and it doesn't slip around. I don't regret buying this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Eye

customer_reviews.title: The size is great and it’s easy to store.
customer_reviews.text: This is great for my home abdominal work outs. The size is great and it’s easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: A. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The pad is located on the lower side and it is not padded on the main part at all and feels like a brick when using it. Your shoulder should hit the ground on the other side and don't as it is thicker on the other side very uncomfortable using it.
customer_reviews.author: angela cox

customer_reviews.title: I like the mat overall
customer_reviews.text: I like the mat overall, I just find it a bit long and bulky for my smaller frame. It is much firmer than the ones I use at the gym, but I imagine it will get more broken in with time...
customer_reviews.author: Jchris

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: First off i wanna say that i suck at sit ups, whenever i do them i have to keep my feet planted and held down somewhere. But not only that sadly i get back aches and i feel more of the burn on my legs. This product made a huge difference in my form and excersice. My abs now feel more of a burn, and my back doenst hurt! It also slips under my bed perfectly. It is a good material and honestly id reccomened this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Baez

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the days I can’t make it to the gym and still need a workout. I used a similar mat while working out with a friend and this mat was cheaper and still does the job! I can’t speak to how long it lasts since I haven’t had it long, but so far it’s been great! Easy product to use, plus it’s hreat back support
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn E

customer_reviews.title: Great for doing sit-ups!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to use for doing your sit-ups as it offers the much needed cushion for your tailbone.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette Loper

customer_reviews.title: the answer for AB work when you have lower back issues
customer_reviews.text: this is what you need for lower back issues....I dont know how I stumbled across it, but glad i did
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: I can feel and see results
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a try and wow am I glad I did , following the exercise guide I was able to do the exercises without feeling strain in my back. It positions you so all you feel is the work in your core muscles. Very happy with the purchase and results.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: I like my situps!
customer_reviews.text: The extra flap is too thick for me. Kind of negates the support of the curved mat part. I typically just use it backward and the extra piece as a head mat. Maybe that's what it's for?
customer_reviews.author: ali

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: I really really like it I will never do regular sit ups again
customer_reviews.author: Dff

customer_reviews.title: Synergee makes quality products
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the products at Synergee for years and they are great quality! They have very reasonable prices and are excellent when it comes to customer service. They have a scholarship program and offer discounts for teachers and service members. What a great company!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Schwausch

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I visited a personal trainer and she pulled out one of these that was similar. I had never used one but as soon as I realized how effective it was in targeting the core and reducing strain I knew I had to have one. I saw this one and decided to give it a try and I’m glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret S.

customer_reviews.title: Im really surprised how comfortable this is
customer_reviews.text: I like this mat. As much as I dislike working out, this mat does exactly what it says. Also many configurations that I can put it in to adapt to most situations. For the price, this definitely is at the top of my list. Just wish there was a blue option still!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Pain Free Sit Ups
customer_reviews.text: I've always found it difficult to do sit-ups. It seems like I end up straining my neck or back. Having this core ab mat has made all the difference! It has given me enough back support and lift so I can properly do sit-ups. I love it and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MomTo2

customer_reviews.title: Save the tailbone!
customer_reviews.text: This mat has become a daily necessity at crossfit. Your tailbone will thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brown

customer_reviews.title: I have a bad back and needed the extra support while doing crunches ...
customer_reviews.text: This has really helped my with supporting my back while doing some floor exercises. I have a bad back and needed the extra support while doing crunches and leg lifts to strengthen my abdomen muscles.
customer_reviews.author: ceb21

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I chose this one — I found the size ...
customer_reviews.text: Looking around at various online choices and user reviews, I was most concerned about the firmness of these ab mats — many people complained about them being too hard or uncomfortable. I'm so glad I chose this one — I found the size and firmness of this mat to be perfect (I'm 5 foot 3) — solid and supportive but not at all uncomfortable to use!

customer_reviews.title: Sit ups for days
customer_reviews.text: Works great seems very durable will be using for abmat sit-up at the gym nice size to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Beach bum 1985

customer_reviews.title: Firm and maybe a higher arch?
customer_reviews.text: Great! Happy with our fast delivery. I'd say this is a bit stiff and on the higher side, so I think its also ideal for my boyfriend who is 6'6" and has a more pronounced arch. I'm thinking maybe it will break in, but it does feel a little high for my 5'2" frame.
customer_reviews.author: Maura

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this ab mat for home after my husband started using one at the gym. It’s a great core workout while providing comfort and support for the lumbar area. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: easy on the back!
customer_reviews.text: It makes doing sit-ups so much better. It is great not too feel pain in my back. If you can believe it makes sits up enjoyable. Well made and looks like it will work for a long time. Received in great time.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this ab mat it is made out of durable material non slip bottom seat pad 1 inch thick and very comfortable great product
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Helps work the core not strain the back
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Definitely helps the positioning of my back allowing me to work my core and not strain my back. Only suggestion would be for there to me a more grippy material on the bottom. It slips a bit while you're powering out a long set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my clients love the mat
customer_reviews.text: my clients love the mat!! they can sit on the flat part w/ cushion, and put their lumbar on the rounded part, which keeps their natural arch while doing ab work. I also have the one with the square black mat part, and love using it with my leg press machine, so clients can keep the natural arch again. i have the pink ones w/ mat, and blue ones without mat.
customer_reviews.author: Kri Chay

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your home gym
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and very good quality. It’s a must have for your home gym. It provides you better range of motion while supporting your lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comport, good material and solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Solid ab mat for those looking to increase core strength. Excellent comport, good material and solid construction. Quick shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kristian D. Randt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for helping me with sit-ups. I would certainly recommend this product, comes with a guide for other exercises!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price - stands up to the higher priced Ab Mats.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Ab Mat. We use another very high priced Ab Mat at the gym where I work out and this one is just as good, if not better. Great support, perfect thickness, and very good quality. I am very happy with this product and would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Katsiamakis

customer_reviews.title: A little comfort goes a long way to not giving up
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional exercise machine; I just do what I can to try to stay healthy. On that note, this ab mat helps with comfort by keeping your back arched properly and adds more range of motion. The range helps get more out of the exercise but for me the added comfort is everything because it has helped me stay on doing my routine.
customer_reviews.author: Yolteotl

customer_reviews.title: Good mat
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat, does what it is intended to do. Stays in place well. Does seem a little too thick other than that it works well. For the price you cant beat it
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely Functional and comfortable for clients of all ages. Double pad feature gives comfort to core ab work.
customer_reviews.author: ELITE LIFE & FITNESS INC.

customer_reviews.title: Lite weight
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Comfortable to use. Wish it had a handle on the side to tote around.
customer_reviews.author: Mzgator

customer_reviews.title: Bearable
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty good just a little to firm but bearable..
customer_reviews.author: wes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Only used a couple of times but if you have any issues with sit ups or reverse crunches then this is the perfect tool for your workouts. Love that the mat folds under the arch for easy storage under your bed or dresser. Could easily be taken to the gym as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Solid ab mat
customer_reviews.text: Very well made mat, solid construction. Colors are a nice touch. The padding is harder than what I am used to, but works just fine and cant beat the price. Seems like it will hold up well.

customer_reviews.title: Two 👍🏽s up
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Well made. I use one at my crossfit club and this is exactly what I was looking for. Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Too hard and tall
customer_reviews.text: Way toooooo hard and tall it hurts to use I have to arch so far not comfortable at all. I am a thin active person who works out too
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived exactly as described but it still hurt my back but that's just me. It was too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie P. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got the product like expected and it's good quality. I got the one with the tail bone extension and if I purchased it again I would get the one without the tail bone extension. Reason being I'm used to the one without the extension and the extension piece is thick like it should be but it just feels different to me is all. This is a good quality product and I'd purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Product, Fast Shipping, Awesome Company
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Ab mat! I love the sleek simple design and most of all, I didn’t even know it was going to come with a cool guide with other exercises I could do with it. No question, I rather do sit ups using this ab mat as apposed to just doing it on the floor. And I also feel more of a burn! They are such a great company!
customer_reviews.author: Sandora

customer_reviews.title: Good product worthwhile to have
customer_reviews.text: This Mat is quite helpful to my practice. I searched many different products and finally found that this one has both good quality and reasonable price. I don't feel any back pain when I use it. It also has a tailbone protecting pad which is quite useful and convenient for practice. It is definitely worthwhile to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Jiong Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Terrific “workout gear” buy
customer_reviews.text: I had used an an mat in an interval class recently. I was so happy that I could once again do my ab exercises without my lower back hurting that I ordered this mat for home. I love having one at home so I can do my ab work at home. This mat is actually more supportive than the mat at my gym. I highly recommend this addition to your workout gear!!! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Pellegrino

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Better texture than competitors.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great value. I love the texture, especially when doing a lot of reps. It really keeps you from slipping unlike the non textured competitors. I did feel like the mat was stiffer than I expected, but after standing on it and pressing in it has softened up to my liking!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Gym quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ab mat to use when I travel. I can tell you it’s the exact same quality as used in my gym! I’m very impressed with the durability of the ab mat. I would highly recommend this mat to anyone looking for great quality and durability at an awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: Danna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sit-ups and handstand work
customer_reviews.text: iheartsynergee Core May Ab is awesome to use. It’s great for working on my core and doing sit ups, as well as practicing headstands, and handstand push-ups. It’s soft enough on your back and is the perfect workout accessory for my apartment. This item arrived so quickly and I’m very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Darwin Recentes

customer_reviews.title: High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was accustomed to a completely flat ab mat before looking into the benefits of one with lower back support. Has made a big difference in my ab routine and I don't think I will go back to a flat mat anytime soon! Very pleased with my purchase, and certainly the quality of this product. Seems like it will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: John Bickel

product_meta.title: Synergee Core Mat Ab Mat Abdominal Mat Sit-Up Pad - Abdominal Trainer Mat for Sit Up Routines and Six Pack
feature_bullets: ★ EFFECTIVE DESIGN ★ – The Synergee Core Mat is perfectly designed to fit the contours of your lower back to provide support and stability during ab exercises. It will stay firmly in place as you move, allowing you to focus solely on your workout, without worrying about scooching yourself across the gym floor!

★ MAKE EVERY REP COUNT ★ – Sit ups are a staple for most fitness routines. And yet, most people are doing them inefficiently. Our solution is this Core Mat! Make every sit up efficient and effective by allowing your abdominal to fully extend and contract. The Mat allows your lumbar spine to stay in a neutral position and your abdominal muscles to go through a full range of motion for maximum gains with every sit up.

★ COMPACT & PORTABLE ★ – The Core Mat is complete as one piece, contains no moving parts, and is light and compact. It is extremely easy to store when not using or carry with you to your living room, garage, friend’s house, the park, or any other place you want to tone your core. Turn any space into a spot to comfortably sit-up on, do handstand push-ups, have cushioned knees during lunges, and more!

★ WHAT’S IN THE PACKAGE ★ – Synergee Core Mat is 14" x 12" x 3" . In total, it weighs 3.5 lbs. Pack Includes: (1) Core Mat, (1) Exercise Manual with six different exercises. This Core Mat comes in Black.

★ NO SWEAT GUARANTEE ★ – Leave the sweating and swearing for your training! Buying from Synergee means quick, hassle-free, and caring customer service! Plus, we offer a better-than-money-back guarantee: if there is an issue with your product for any reason, we will send you a new one quickly and absolutely FREE! 100% Customer Satisfaction is our Number 1 Goal!
